column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////JINYA has a great atmosphere and good food. Big portions
column2: as well as many customizable plate options offer variety and flexibility. Prices were a little on the high side for an Asian bistro
column3: but not terribly bad. A limited
column4: but unique cocktail menu with imported Lychee liquor offers a refreshing change of pace. Unfortunately
column5: for me JINYA lost the 4-star rating due to the lackluster service. The place was relatively busy
column8: and unprofessional. Other than the service
column9: I would say JINYA is a great option if you're looking for a modern ramen bar.
